description: Images from “Rise of the Planet of the Apes.”
title: The New York Times
title_page: Apes Unite - The New York Times
maintext:
Slide 1 of 8,
Manohla Dargis writes:
"'Rise of the Planet of the Apes,' an amusingly cheerful film about the end of humanity that’s PETA and critic approved is precisely the kind of summer diversion that the studios have such a hard time making now."
The ape Caesar in "Rise of the Planet of the Apes."
